name: Power Uninterrupted
title: Reliable Electricity Supply
description: In 2019, only 2% of firms in Italy reported experiencing electrical outages, showcasing one of the most reliable electricity supplies globally.

name: Food Security Champions
title: Low Food Insecurity Levels
description: As of 2022, only 2% of Italy's population faced moderate or severe food insecurity, highlighting the country's effective food security measures.
